explains: n. 门闩，窗闩；<英>碰锁，碰簧锁；（电子）门闩线路，锁存器
v. 闩上（门），用弹簧锁锁住（门等）；（电子）（装置）状态恒定；占有，抓住
wordGroup: latch on 占有；抓住；理解
on the latch 关着但不上锁

sentences.en: She listened for his key in the latch.
sentences.cn: 她留神听着他把钥匙插入门锁。

sentences.en: He lifted the latch and opened the door.
You left the latch off the gate and the dog escaped.
